Description:
Host Without Firewall. Alert means not complied. Sigma for Qualys vulnerability scanner. Scan type - Vulnerability Management.

Author: Alexandr Yampolskyi, SOC Prime
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Host Without Firewall
Query: sourcetype like 'qualys-%' eql select * from _source_ where event.category = 'security policy' and host.scan.vuln_name like '%firewall product not detected%'
